parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
The language of the response. Valid values:

*   zh: Chinese
*   en: English

parameters.name: DeleteSlb
parameters.description: Specifies whether to delete the SLB instance purchased for the gateway when you delete the gateway.

parameters.name: GatewayUniqueId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the gateway.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the association record.

parameters.name: SlbId
parameters.description: The ID of the SLB instance that needs to be deleted.
